title: Bungalow Style House on 49p in Delkanda, Nugegoda
details:
This 49 perch property has a beautiful single story bungalow style house and is within 50m of Highlevel Road in Delkanda, Nugegoda. Approximately 60 feet of road frontage and ample garden space and parking makes this a very attractive property to become your home. 4 Bedrooms, spacious general living areas and fabulous greenery and trees. Elevated land which reaches nearly 5 feet above road level. Rs. 3m per perch. Call now for an appointment.

Mobile - 0774 800 623
E-mail - yohan@khane.lk
More properties - www.remax.lk/yohan
